==What to Do==
Require authentication for all users.
==Why==
Require authentication for all users to prevent unauthorized access. If a user account is not protected with at least a password, an attacker will be able to easily use that account.
==How==
To force authentication for all users:
# **Identify authentication code.** Make a spreadsheet about the code that implements authentication in the application. # **Require authentication for all users.** If it doesn't already require authentication for all users, modify authentication code so that at least a password is required for successful authentication for all users. Remove code that implements any special hard-coded user accounts that don't require authentication.
